original_text: And he shall dwell in that city, until he stand before the congregation for judgment, and until the death of the high priest that shall be in those days: then shall the slayer return, and come unto his own city, and unto his own house, unto the city from whence he fled.
korean_text: 그 살인자는 회중 앞에 서서 재판을 받기까지 또는 그 당시 대제사장이 죽기까지 그 성읍에 거주하다가 그 후에 그 살인자는 그 성읍 곧 자기가 도망하여 나온 자기 성읍 자기 집으로 돌아갈지니라 하라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And he shall dwell in that city
until he stand before the congregation for judgment
sentences.korean_translation: 재판을 위해 회중 앞에 설 때까지

sentences.original_text: and until the death of the high priest
that shall be in those days
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날들에 있을 그 대제사장의 죽음까지

sentences.original_text: and come unto his own city
unto the city from whence he fled
